mapper.select: SELECT id, original_lost_item_id as originalLostItemId, name, type, color, description, found_location as foundLocation, building, specific_location as specificLocation, image_url as imageUrl, publish_time as publishTime, apply_time as applyTime, claim_status as claimStatus, claimer_student_id as claimerStudentId, claimer_name as claimerName, claimer_phone as claimerPhone FROM claimed_items WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND claim_status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY apply_time DESC
